duties_responsibilities.duty: Provides support for implementation, troubleshooting, and maintenance of Information Technology (IT) systems.
Manages IT system infrastructure and any processes related to these systems.
Provides Tier 1 (Help Desk) and Tier 2 (Escalation) problem identification, diagnosis, and resolution of problems.
Configures and manages UNIX and Windows operating systems and installs/loads operating system software.
Supports the design of systems, mission architecture, and associated hardware.
Analyzes and resolves complex problems associated with server hardware, applications, and software integration.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in a technical discipline from an accredited college or university is required.
